Timothy Ring – Bridgewater Councilman

 

 

COUNCILMAN TIMOTHY RING

Representative to:
Budget/Finance Committee

Liaison to:
Bridgewater-Raritan Board of Education

Alternate Liaison to:
Bridgewater/Somerset County Library Committee

Councilman Ring can be reached at tring@bridgewaternj.gov
